100.description: Mine or receive 1 DUCO. Everyone has to start somewhere, right?
100.name: Freshman

101.description: Mine or receive 100 DUCO. Looks like you're catching speed, watch out for speed radars!
101.name: Rising Star

102.description: Mine or receive 777 DUCO. Look - a four-leaf clover! We're so lucky to have you here
102.name: Entrepreneur

103.description: Reach 100 000 accepted shares in one of your miners. Finally a stable setup, huh?
103.name: Mining Expert

104.description: Get your account verified. Really. Just that.
104.name: Professional Photographer

105.description: Buy at least 10 000 DUCO from the DUCO Exchange or FluffySwap in a single take. Good decision!
105.name: Beginner Investor

106.description: Buy at least 100 000 DUCO from the DUCO Exchange or FluffySwap in a single take. Nice choice!
106.name: For Better Future

107.description: Reach 5 000 accepted shares in one of your miners. The fun just begins!
107.name: Kolkastart

108.description: Phased out: Staking is not available anymore
108.name: Steak? Nah, it's a stake!

109.description: Phased out: Staking is not available anymore
109.name: My steak is done! I mean, the stake!

110.description: Buy at least 1 million DUCO from the DUCO Exchange or FluffySwap in a single take. You're the big boss now.
110.name: The Godfather

111.description: Reach 1 million accepted shares in one of your miners. Maybe you should start a mining company?
111.name: Mining Empire

112.description: Find a block during mining. The so-called big blocks are randomly found by miners giving big rewards and supporting the network
112.name: Brick by brick, block by block...

113.description: Buy your own cell on the iNFTer.net with Duino-Coins
113.name: The Braincell

114.description: Reach 20 000 accepted shares in one of your miners. Looks like you're gaining speed.
114.name: Mining Headman

115.description: Use an Arduino (AVR) board for mining.
115.name: AVR Ore Hunter

116.description: Use an ESP8266 board for mining.
116.name: WLAN Wealth Wizard

117.description: Use an ESP32 board for mining.
117.name: Airwave Resource Hunter

118.description: Use a Raspberry Pi (SBC) for mining.
118.name: Crypto Pi Pioneer

119.description: Report Internet-of-Things data with your miner.
119.name: IoT Innovator

120.description: Get rewarded from submitting work to the content creators' corner.
120.name: Artist

121.description: Send coins to the coinburn account to burn (delete) them.
121.name: You Will Be Baked [...]

123.description: Your account is at least 2 years old
123.name: Veteran

124.description: Your account is at least 1 year old
124.name: Experienced Miner

126.description: Reach 500 000 accepted shares in one of your miners. Keep going!
126.name: Halfway to 6 Zeroes

127.description: Reach 2 million accepted shares in one of your miners. Nothing can stop you anymore
127.name: Mining Obsession

129.description: Use the Web Miner for mining.
129.name: Internet Surfer

130.description: Support Duino-Coin in the BitStorage listing fundraiser. Thank you!
130.name: BitStorage Hero

999.description: More achievements will be added in the near future
999.name: Coming Soon
